name: FutureSight Career Planner
description: An AI-powered career and academic planning application built with Next.js and Genkit.

GEMINI_API_KEY.description: Your Google AI Gemini API key.

NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_API_KEY.description: Firebase API Key from your Firebase project settings.

NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN.description: Firebase Auth Domain from your Firebase project settings.

NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID.description: Firebase Project ID from your Firebase project settings.

NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET.description: Firebase Storage Bucket from your Firebase project settings.

NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID.description: Firebase Messaging Sender ID from your Firebase project settings.

NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_APP_ID.description: Firebase App ID from your Firebase project settings.
